Name: Spin Quest: A Slot Adventure
About the game: Set off on a journey to amass great power and wealth! Explore different zones, each with unique slot games that can grant you amazing bonuses. Fight off enemies of all shapes and sizes, from wildlife to mystical creatures, and obtain epic loot that can improve your odds. Level up and train unique skills that will help you on your way to glory. Collect magical items and record heroic deeds. Every action you complete will make you more powerful.
